category.catDesc: Used to denote a date calculated by the editor from a regnal year or some other dating method given in the text.

revisionDesc.change: CHANGED: Add a human readable version or the tei:relation element in a tei:desc.

relation.desc: Severus of Antioch sent a letter to Misael.
Misael sent a letter to Severus of Antioch.
Andrew carried a letter from Misael to Severus of Antioch.
Andrew carried a letter from Misael to Severus of Antioch.
Andrew, Severus of Antioch, Theodosius, patriarch of Alexandria and Theodora, Roman empress had a professional relationship.
Severus of Antioch had enmity for Sergius bar Fathya.
Anonymous 3120 was the parent of Sergius bar Fathya.

person.persName: The wife or concubine of the father of Sergius

relation.desc: Anonymous 3121 and Sergius bar Fathya had a serious intimate relationship.
Severus of Antioch had enmity for Anonymous 3122.
Severus of Antioch had enmity for Anatolius.
Severus of Antioch had enmity for Podalirius.
Podalirius was the parent of Anonymous 3123.

personGrp.persName: The bishops attending the Council of Nicaea

relation.desc: Alexander of Alexandria was part of Anonymi 3089.
Theodora, Roman empress had enmity for Alexander of Alexandria and Athanasius, bishop of Alexandria.

person.persName: The magnificent and Christ-loving chamberlain, Julian

relation.desc: Severus of Antioch and Julian had a professional relationship.
